name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-trey-research-auth
title: Trey Research TS Auth
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create an agent that interacts with a protected consulting API to provide information about consultants and projects.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create an agent that interacts with a protected consulting API to provide information about consultants and projects. The agent can answer questions about consultants and their projects

thumbnails.alt: Demonstration of Trey Research Auth sample
